text: The Flying Fool may refer to: *The Flying Fool (1925 film), an American silent film starring Gaston Glass *The Flying Fool (1929 film), an American film starring William Boyd *The Flying Fool (1931 film), a British film starring Henry Kendall *The Flying Fool (play), a play by Arnold Ridley and Bernard Merivale ==See also== *Those Fantastic Flying Fools, 1967 British film starring Burl Ives
title: The Flying Fool
